name: Kross Kart
description:
In Kross Kart you control two cars racing in opposite directions! Honestly the challenge is just to finish! There are 3 tracks currently. Each car must complete 2 laps per track, and they must complete the track in the appropriate direction (i.e. their starting direction). 

Made in 7 days for the Yogscast game jam 2021!

Currently there is no indicator for when a car is moving in the wrong direction, but this is my highest priority for updates so it should be done soon!

QUICK GUIDE FOR LOST SOULS

Track 1 (RED) : 

         Top - clockwise

         Bottom: counter-clockwise

Track 2 (PINK) : 

         Top - counter-clockwise

         Bottom: clockwise

Track 3 (GREY) : 

         Top - clockwise

         Bottom: counter-clockwise

If you're having trouble managing both cars at once you can just finish the track with one car at a time (just let the other car slam into the wall for a bit lol)

This is my first ever 3d Game as well as my first ever Unity game! Everything is a little scuffed right now so sorry about that, expect some small bugs and extremely minimal UI. updates in the works now!
